name: MARY BOWMAN’S POPPY SEED DRESSING
ingredients: Potato salad – red potatoes medium size – boils in water and adds salt 30 minutes - check with fork.
instructions: In a glass jar with a tight-fitted lid, combine all dressing ingredients; shake until well blended
Just before serving, pour about ½ cup of dressing over salad; toss lightly
If cooking for two: dressing may be kept in the refrigerator for up to 1 week
Peel potatoes after they boil, add dressing from below.
